comment:
Два бандита с пушками (human female и human male) окружили human female проповедницу у разбитой статуи Императора.

human female проповедница

languages.text: "Вы смеете вымогать деньги у представителя Экклезиархии? Это святотатство!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы смеете вымогать деньги у представителя Экклезиархии? Это святотатство!"

languages.text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
languages.original_text: "Вы смеете вымогать деньги у представителя Экклезиархии? Это святотатство!"

traits.locale_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
"You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
"You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
"You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
"You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"
"You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

languages.text: “你竟敢勒索国教代表的财物？这……这是在亵渎帝皇！”
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢勒索国教代表的财物？这……这是在亵渎帝皇！”

languages.text: 「お前！帝国聖教会の代表から、金をゆする気か？これは冒涜だ！」
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前！帝国聖教会の代表から、金をゆする気か？これは冒涜だ！」

languages.text: «¿Cómo se atreve a extorsionar a un representante de la Eclesiarquía? ¡Esto es una blasfemia!».
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo se atreve a extorsionar a un representante de la Eclesiarquía? ¡Esto es una blasfemia!».

languages.text: "Ihr wagt es, von einem Vertreter der Ekklesiarchie Geld zu erpressen? Das ist Blasphemie!"
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wagt es, von einem Vertreter der Ekklesiarchie Geld zu erpressen? Das ist Blasphemie!"

languages.text: « Vous osez extorquer de l'argent à un représentant de l'Ecclésiarchie ? C'est un blasphème ! »
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous osez extorquer de l'argent à un représentant de l'Ecclésiarchie ? C'est un blasphème ! »

languages.text: "Ekleşiarşi temsilcilerinden para koparmaya mı çalışıyorsunuz? Bu dine aykırılıktır!"
languages.original_text: "You dare extort money from a representative of the Ecclesiarchy? This is blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ekleşiarşi temsilcilerinden para koparmaya mı çalışıyorsunuz? Bu günahkârlıktır!"
